IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE CONVENIENT, QUALITY HEALTHCARE TO EVERYONE IN A CARING, EFFICIENT AND FINANCIALLY RESPONSIBLE MANNER THAT WILL ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF LIFE IN OUR COMMUNITY, TO PROMOTE COMMUNITY WELLNESS; AND, TO DO SO WITH COMPASSION, DIGNITY, AND RESPECT FOR THOSE WE SERVE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE CONVENIENT, QUALITY HEALTHCARE TO EVERYONE IN A CARING, EFFICIENT AND FINANCIALLY RESPONSIBLE MANNER THAT WILL ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF LIFE IN OUR COMMUNITY, TO PROMOTE COMMUNITY WELLNESS; AND, TO DO SO WITH COMPASSION, DIGNITY, AND RESPECT FOR THOSE WE SERVE.
IRS990.Desc: CHICOT MEMORIAL MEDICAL CENTER IS A PRIVATE, NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION OPERATING A 25-BED CRITICAL ACCESS HOSPITAL IN LAKE VILLAGE, CHICOT COUNTY, ARKANSAS. IN ADDITION TO THE 25 ACUTE CARE BEDS, CMMC ALSO OPEATES TWO PROVIDER BASED HEALTH CLINICS (GENERAL SURGERY AND OBSTETRICS/GYNECOLOGY) WITH ONE PHYSICIAN IN EACH SPECIALTY IN EACH CLINIC. ADDITIONALLY, CMMC OPERATES A HOME HEALTH AGENCY, AND A COMMUNITY BASED FITNESS CENTER, ALL ON A NOT-FOR-PROFIT BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT ANNUALLY REVIEWS ITS TAX POSITION AND HAS DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE RECOGNITION IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 5 - Account Input from Persons Who Represent the Community

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part III, Line 9b - Provisions On Collection Practices For Qualified Patients
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHARITY CARE MAY BE GRANTED PROSPECTIVELY OR RETROSPECTIVELY. ALL OVERDUE ACCOUNTS WILL BE REVIEWED INTERNALLY TO DETERMINE WHETHER ANY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE IS AVAILABLE PRIOR TO THE INITIATION OF ANY LEGAL PROCEDDINGS OR COLLECTION ACTION OUTSIDE OF THE HOSPITAL
UTILIZES ANNUAL STATISTICAL REPORT WITH DEMOGRAPHIC INFORMATION FROM DHS AS WELL AS REPORTS SHOWING PERCENT OF ACTIVITY OF COMMUNITY BY PAYOR SOURCE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part VI, Line 3 - Patient Education of Eligibility for Assistance
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INFORMS PATIENTS UPON ADMISSION AND POSTS NOTICES IN CONSPICUOUS AREAS
RURAL SETTING, PREDOMINANTLY AGRICULTURAL BASE. AVERAGE INCOME AT OR BELOW FEDERAL POVERTY GUIDELINES. HIGH SCHOOL EDUCATED AND GERIATRIC IN NATURE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part VI, Line 5 - Promotion of Community Health
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHICOT MEMORIAL MEDICAL CENTER PROVIDES GENERAL MEDICAL AND SURGICAL CARE FOR INPATIENT, OUTPATIENT, AND EMERGENCEY ROOM PATIENTS, AND PARTICIPATES IN THE MEDICARE AND MEDICAID PROGRAMS. CMMC PROMOTES COMMUNITY WELLNESS THROUGH VOLUNTEERING AND DONATIONS FROM THE HOSPITAL

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V - Explanation of Number of Facility Type
Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY A MEMBER OF MANAGEMENT AND PROVIDED TO BOARD MEMBERS AT A SCHEDULED MEETING FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INDIVIDUAL WHO SERVE AS DIRECTORS, MANAGERS, SUPERVISORS OF CLINICAL DEPARTMENTS AND ANY OTHER EMPLOYEE OR MEDICAL STAFF MEMBER DEEMED BY AN ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER TO BE IN A POSITION TO INFLUENCE DECISION-MAKING FOR THE HOSPITAL, ARE REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE ALL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. DISCLOSURE WILL OCCUR THROUGH AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT AND THE DISCLOSURE OF OTHER ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL CONFLICTS AS THEY ARISE. PRIOR TO DECISIONS BEING MADE, DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES STATE ALL CONFLICTS AND DO NOT DISCUSS THE ISSUES OF POTENTIAL CONFLICT AND DO NOT PARTICIPATE IN DECISION MAKING OF THOSE ISSUES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION IS APPROVED BY BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND IS BASED ON MARKET CONDITIONS AND PERFORMANCE EVALUATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION IS APPROVED BY CEO AND IS BASED ON SALARY SURVEYS AND PERFORMANCE EVALUATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
